transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, Sunil sir, Vivek baat kar raha tha, kal aapko call kiya tha na maine?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan, main Vivek baat kar raha tha sir, account manager IndiaMART se, kal aapko connect kiya tha na main shaam ke time par, aap bol rahe the busy hoon main is time pe bhi.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan, aapne bola tha subah ke time pe call, call karunga, aaj ke liye bola tha aapne subah ke time pe call karne ke liye.
Customer: Haan sir, haan sir. Aapki taraf se woh not satisfied aaya tha, koi market nahi aaya na, usi ke regarding maine call kiya tha, aap, aapka concern tha ki aapko business nahi mil raha hai, matlab IndiaMART ki taraf se bhi aap plan apne naya naya liya hua hai aur aapko us type ka nahi mil pa raha jis type ka aapne subscription lagaya hua hai, iska aapko nahi mil raha.
Customer: Sir, clear aawaz nahi aa rahi aapki.
Executive: Hello, abhi aa rahi hai sir meri aawaz, hello.
Customer: Hello, haan sir.
Executive: Haan, ye, ye keh raha hoon main ki aapne ticket raise kari thi na woh not satisfied ki ki aapko business nahi mil raha hai IndiaMART ki taraf se, aapne plan purchase kiya uska.
Hain na?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan, toh main aapko uske bare mein bata deta hoon. Clear aawaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.
Executive: Abhi aa rahi sir meri aawaz, hello, abhi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan sir, haan sir ab aa rahi hai. Clear nahi aa rahi.
Executive: Haan, acha mujhe, acha acha sir, theek hai sir, mujhe ye ek cheez bataiyega sir, ki aapki matlab order value kitni ka rehti hai, matlab ki amount kitna tak, kitne amount tak ka order aap, aap jo hai purchase ka matlab connect kar sakte hain matlab.
Customer: Sir, product par hai hisab se.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hain sir?
Customer: Product ke hisab se hai sir.
Executive: Nahi nahi, product ke upar maan liya maine, par ek, ek order value hoti hai na amount type ka hota hai ki nahi, itne amount tak toh hum kahin bhi deal kar sakte hain, uske alawa itne se kam hoga toh hum nahi kar payenge.
Business wagera, toh utna main puch raha tha ki amount hoga aapka kuch ek particular ki itne tak aapko karna hai.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Kitna hai aapka wohi puch raha tha main.
Customer: Woh minimum hai sir, budget ke hisab se, aam aadmi ke hisab se 20 se 35,000.
Executive: 20 se?
Customer: 35,000.
Executive: 20 se 35,000.
Customer: Haan, amount.
Executive: Haan, main kya hai kuch kuch cheeze hai na aapki note karte hue ja raha hoon, kya hai ki dekhiye aap jo hai, ek September ko aap humse jude hue hain, theek hai?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Aapne IndiaMART pe aapne live line up hue hain, abhi aapko servicing nahi mile toh main actually jo aapko jo main main concern jo hai issues hai woh note karta ja raha hoon main, pehla toh aapka ho gaya hai ki 20 se 35,000 tak ki aapko order value chahiye, theek hai sir?
Customer: Hmm hmm. Theek hai, iske alawa dusra mujhe ye bataiye ki aapko location wise kya chahiye, matlab ki location aap pan India mein karenge ya uske alawa aapki kuch specific kuch cities hai jahan par ye aapni karna chahenge only?
Customer: Sir, all India ke liye.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Nahi, matlab main ye keh raha hoon ki pure, pure India mein aap kahin bhi deal kar sakte hain jo aapki product hai na ye marbles mein. Haan sir. Haan, haan maro. Pure India mein kar sakte hain kahin bhi na?
Customer: Haan sir. Executive: Toh acha IndiaMART platform aap hi use kar rahe hain na waise toh?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Mobile mein kar rahe hain, laptop wagera mein ya koi computer system wagera mein kar rahe hain kuch?
Customer: Mobile wagera mein kar rahe hain sir. Executive: Mobile mein kar rahe hain, theek hai sir, main kya hai ki aapko apni side se na Google Meet ki link send kar raha hoon, toh aap usko join kar lijiyega, main kuch practically aapko idhar se thoda bahut dikha dunga, issues wagera aapko.
Customer: Sir, abhi order bhi nahi aa rahe sir isme.
Executive: Haan, woh main woh sab aapko main clear kar raha hoon na idhar se, kyunki maine isliye note down kiye na apni side se ki aapko jo hai ki problem actually kya kya hai toh hamari team se ek taraf se usko sahi kiya jaaye, hain na? Aur kuch cheeze kya hai jo aap application humne diya hai na aapko IndiaMART chalane ke liye toh uska jo kya hai dummy account mere paas bhi rehta hai aapka jo aap jo aap access karte ho mere paas bhi rehta hai idhar se, toh aap Google Meet ke link main send kar raha hoon na aapko usse aap join kijiye, kuch kuch cheeze isme agar mujhe missing lagegi toh main woh sahi kara dunga aapse puch kar haal ki haali, woh mujhe bata dijiyega aur kuch kuch cheeze main isme aur extra add on karke aur aapko bataunga uske bare mein, hain na? Uske baad phir hum aapka business jo hai theek se hi tarike se karaenge.
Hain na sir? Main link send kar raha hoon aapke mobile par hi, mobile mein jo Gmail hai IndiaMART se available woh hai na abhi aapke paas active?
Customer: Yes sir.
Executive: Theek hai, main usi pe send kar raha hoon hain na, ek second.
Executive: Haan, send kariye sir maine, ek bari check kariye zara aayi hai kya aapke paas?
Customer: Dekhta hoon sir.
Executive: Haan ji, check kariye.
Customer: Aayi hai kya sir?
Customer: Nahi aayi sir.
Executive: Nahi aayi hai, WhatsApp pe send kar doon kya main aapke sir?
Customer: Okay sir, WhatsApp pe kar do. Executive: Main WhatsApp pe karta hoon, aap line pe rahiyega, WhatsApp pe send kar raha hoon zara.
Customer: Bhej nahi rahe sir aap.
Executive: Sir, high ka message kiya hai, check kariye high ka message aaya kya aapke paas?
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Abhi aaya maine send kiya hua hai, ye last mein, ye number aapke hai na 77373867245 ispe send kiya hai maine.
Customer: Haan sir, 37375876403.
Customer: Inko nahi aaya sir message aaya nahi.
Executive: Aaya nahi, main dusre wale number pe karta hoon ek second.
Executive: Abhi dekhiye, abhi dusre wale number pe kiya hai maine ye 7375876403 ispe aa gaya hai na?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan, toh main link send kar raha hoon, aap mujhe return se high please kariye zara.
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Aap reply kariye mujhe kuch bhi message kar dijiye, high kar dijiye, kuch bhi dot wagera kuch bhi send kar dijiye reply mein.
Customer: Dopahar ko baat karenge chalega kya? Clear aawaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.
Executive: Woh main phir usse clear aawaz aane lagegi, main phir call disconnect kar dunga aur directly aapko video meeting baat karunga toh clear aawaz aane lagegi aapke paas na, abhi aap.
Customer: Haan sir, clear aawaz nahi aa rahi, main kya abhi kya bahar hoon na isliye.
Executive: Acha acha, theek theek hai, abhi check kariye ye link aayi hogi aapke paas uspe dekhiye, usko join kar lijiye hain na?
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Haan, join kariye. Thank you sir.
Customer: Baad mein call karta hoon sir. Clear aawaz nahi aa rahi sir aapki.
Executive: Hello, abhi aa rahi hai sir dekhiye, abhi aa rahi hai clear aawaz, hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, haan abhi aa rahi hai?
Customer: Nahi aa rahi sir, clear nahi aa rahi aapki aawaz, hello.
Executive: Main cut, cut karke dobara lagata hoon WhatsApp pe hain na?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough business.

- Customer's voice is not clear.



Resolution:

- Executive is sending a Google Meet link.

- Executive noted customer's concerns.

- Executive will check the customer's account.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, google meet, order value, location
